affiliation.name: Greenland Climate Research Centre, Greenland Institute of Natural Resources, Nuuk, Greenland
Greenland Climate Research Centre, Greenland Institute of Natural Resources, Nuuk, Greenland

description:
QGIS map of Figure 3B-D, enabling to turn on/off layers for better visibility. To display the map in QGIS, open file 'CWC_Fig3.qgz'; layers are stored in zip folder 'world_map.zip' (if they do not open automatically, repair data source in QGIS by choosing the directory of the 'world_map.zip' folder.

R Code to plot Figures 4 & 5, and code to download and clean obis data for cold-water corals.

Please cite the original publication; citation will be added here upon acceptance of the Article.
name: QGIS Map and R code accompanying publication "On the paradox of thriving cold-water coral reefs in the food-limited deep sea".
